channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Tyler, the Creator Unveils New Album ‘Don’t Tap the Glass’ Will Release on Monday
item.description: 🚨 Tyler, the Creator is dropping a new album, 'Don’t Tap the Glass' this Monday! Who's ready to vibe? 🎶🔥 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Chuquimamani-Condori Releases New Album Edits: Listen
item.description: 🎶 Dive into Chuquimamani-Condori's fresh album edits! Your playlist just got a major upgrade! 🔥🎧 #NewRelease #MusicMagic

item.title: 50 Cent’s Publishing Company Sues His Ex-Girlfriend Over Videos With Relationship Claims
item.description: When your ex starts spilling the tea... ☕👀 50 Cent's publishing company is not playing games! #DramaAlert #MusicNews

item.title: she’s green Announce New EP Chrysalis: Hear “Willow”
item.description: 🌿 Dive into the lush sounds of she’s green's new EP 'Chrysalis'! 🎶 Listen to the dreamy track "Willow" now! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert #she'sgreen

item.title: Roddy Bottum (Faith No More, Imperial Teen) Announces Memoir The Royal We
item.description: 📚 Ready to dive into Roddy Bottum's musical journey? Get ready for the ultimate backstage pass with 'The Royal We'! 🤘 #RoddyBottum #MemoirAlert
